dialogue.DialogueString: Great speech boss. Guess this' where I take my leave then-
Hahaha! No, our job has just started! I may want to become president of Midbourgh, but I actually want to provide for those who need it in the surrounding cities as well.
Mr. Geneva, this isn't part of the job, right? (Am I mistaken?)
Boss, I know we are mostly funded by your folks, but we don't have transport. Most cities are wayyyyy too far for us to reach on foot except-
Ya pullin' ma leg here right? You wanna go to the fields and steal the grapes???
Let's get a-move on! I don't want to be late for my reservation at the winery~
You never said nothin 'bout a reservation, you wanna buy out a farm in Dabey? Can you really afford that???
Chill it, big guy, I'm sure we could get a good deal.
What about me, is this something I'm gonna be involved in???
Well if you're so excited to join, you can definitely come along!
What have I done with my life...
